channel.title: Database + Login
channel.description: Is there any free Databases? And Idk how to make a login which I need. Im using http

item.title: Database + Login
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

No. HTTP is a protocol. httpd is the daemon which runs to listen for incoming connections open sockets to them, and send data through using the HTTP protocol.

Read full topic

And Idk how to make a login which I need. Im using http[/quote]

item.title: Database + Login
item.dc:creator: @Wrauld Wrauld
item.description:
@Wrauld wrote:

[quote=“Cheese_Police, post:7, topic:268093”][quote author=Wrauld link=topic=353863.msg2714026#msg2714026 date=1237504517]

Is there any free Databases?
And Idk how to make a login which I need. Im using http

http i believe is a certain server listener, it wouldn’t matter if you had http…

and yes, you need php and mysql.

HOLY SHIT HTTP IS A PROTOCOL

WHICH IS A SOCKET LISTENER
[/quote]

idiot.[/quote]

Read full topic
